alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:25AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong and Gusty West Winds... Strong and gusty west winds are expected along the Rocky Mountain Front and across Glacier County through the early evening hours tonight. Frequent wind gusts of between 45 and 55 mph can be expected over this timeframe, with isolated gusts approaching 65 mph along the immediate Rocky Mountain Front including the east side of Glacier National Park. Travelers, especially those operating high profile vehicles, should be prepared for strong cross winds. In addition, those recreating in the backcountry should be prepared for the potential of falling trees. If hiking or camping in wooded areas, remain vigilant of your surroundings.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
